name: Apartment Loop
description:
Apartment Loop is a text-based interactive story about a family falling apart. It only has one ending. As you move through its spaces, you are given the option to unearth details, exploring the narrative's nooks and crannies.

This game was created for the August 2022 Goblin Bunker Game Jam. Photo used in logo and banner by Gary Bendig on Unsplash. Photo used in background by Annie Spratt on Unsplash
